name: The Guardians (SandJail)
description:
The Guardians is a game made by a student team at Bellecour Ecole (France) in one week in October 2017.

This game need two gamepad and two players to be played.

Made by :
FORESTIER Kiyan (3GD)
CAMPANELLA Mélanie (3GD)
SALOMON Rémi(2GD)
RIBEIRO Dorian (1GD)
VELLAS Claire (3GD)
URIDAT Rémi (3GD)

All right reserved.
